Properties.ProtectedString:
--Rescripted by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") Mesh = Handle:WaitForChild("Mesh")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Sounds = { ShutDown = Tool:WaitForChild("ShutDown"), PoweringUp = Tool:WaitForChild("PoweringUp"), Deflect = Tool:WaitForChild("Deflect"), Pulse = Tool:WaitForChild("Pulse") }
RemovableClasses = {"TouchTransmitter", "RocketPropulsion", "BodyVelocity", "BodyForce", "BodyPosition", "BodyThrust", "LocalScript", "Script"}
Duration = 30 MaxHealDistance = 20
ReadyToActivate = true
Gravity = 196.20
ObjectsAlreadyDeflected = {}
SpherePart = Instance.new("Part") SpherePart.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic SpherePart.Shape = Enum.PartType.Ball SpherePart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth SpherePart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth SpherePart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom SpherePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) SpherePart.CanCollide = false SpherePart.Anchored = true SpherePart.Locked = true SphereMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") SphereMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh SphereMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=90782182" SphereMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=90782359" SphereMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) SphereMesh.Parent = SpherePart
local DisplayPart = Tool:FindFirstChild("DisplayModel")
if DisplayPart then DisplayPart:Destroy() Handle.Transparency = 0.25 end
Tool.Enabled = true
function CheckForClass(Table, Object) for i, v in pairs(Table) do if Object:IsA(v) then return true end end return false end
function CheckTable(Table, Object) for i, v in pairs(Table) do if v == Object then return true end end return false end
function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
function CalculateRecursiveMass(RootPart) local Mass = 0 local function CalculateMass(Parent) for i, v in pairs(Parent:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then Mass = (Mass + v:GetMass()) end CalculateMass(v) end end CalculateMass(RootPart) return Mass end
function ReflectVector3(Incoming, Normal) return (2 * ((-1 * Incoming):Dot(Normal)) * Normal + Incoming) end
function CleanProjectile(Object) if not Object or not Object.Parent then return end local ObjectClone = Object:Clone() for i, v in pairs(ObjectClone:GetChildren()) do if CheckForClass(RemovableClasses, v) then v:Destroy() end end Object:Destroy() ObjectClone.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") return ObjectClone end
function FindPlayerInDirection(StartPosition, Direction) local Attacker = nil local ClosestAngle = math.huge for i, v in pairs(Players:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Player") and v ~= Player and v.Character then local torso = v.Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso then local AngleBetween = math.abs(math.acos((StartPosition - Torso.CFrame.p).unit:Dot(Direction))) if AngleBetween < (math.pi / 4) then if (torso.CFrame.p - StartPosition).magnitude < 300 and AngleBetween < ClosestAngle then Attacker = v ClosestAngle = AngleBetween end end end end end return Attacker end
function CreateReflector(OrientationCFrame) local Sphere = SpherePart:Clone() Sphere.Transparency = 0.75 Sphere.Size = Vector3.new(3, 3, 3) Sphere.CFrame = OrientationCFrame local SphereMesh = Sphere:FindFirstChild("Mesh") SphereMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) Debris:AddItem(Sphere, 3) Sphere.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") Spawn(function() for i = 1, 3, 0.5 do if SphereMesh then SphereMesh.Scale = Vector3.new((0.2 * i), (0.2 * i), (0.2 * i)) end wait(0.05) end local MaxScale = SphereMesh.Scale for j = 1, 0, -0.1 do if SphereMesh then SphereMesh.Scale = (MaxScale * i) wait(0.05) end end end) end
function HandleReflection(Sphere, Part) if not Part or not Part.Parent or Part.Anchored or Part.Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") or Part.Velocity.magnitude < 5 or CalculateRecursiveMass(Part) > 160 then return end if math.acos((Part.CFrame.p - Sphere.CFrame.p).unit:Dot(Part.Velocity.unit)) < (math.pi / 2) or (Part.CFrame.p - Sphere.CFrame.p).magnitude < 13 then return end local ConnectedParts = Part:GetConnectedParts() for i, v in pairs(ConnectedParts) do if v and v.Parent then local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(v) if character and character == CurrentCharacter then return end end end Part = CleanProjectile(Part) if CheckTable(ObjectsAlreadyDeflected, Part) then return end table.insert(ObjectsAlreadyDeflected, Part) Part.CFrame = (Part.CFrame - Part.Velocity * 0.1) Debris:AddItem(Part, 10) CreateReflector(CFrame.new(Part.Position, Part.Position + ((Sphere.Position - Vector3.new(0, (Sphere.Size.Y / 3), 0)) - Part.Position).unit) * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(90), 0, 0)) Part.Anchored = true local SphereMesh = Sphere:FindFirstChild("Mesh") if SphereMesh then SphereMesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 0) end
local Attacker = nil
for i, v in pairs(Part:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and string.lower(v.Name) == string.lower("Creator") and v.Value and v.Value.Parent and v.Value:IsA("Player") then Creator = v.Value end end
Attacker = ((not Attacker and FindPlayerInDirection(Part.Position, Part.Velocity.unit)) or Attacker) if Deflect then Sounds.Deflect:Play() end
wait(1)
if SphereMesh and SphereMesh.Parent then SphereMesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) end if not Part or not Part.Parent then return end
Part.Anchored = false local DeflectVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") local ReflectDirection = ReflectVector3(Part.Velocity.unit, (Part.CFrame.p - Sphere.CFrame.p).unit).unit DeflectVelocity.velocity = ReflectDirection * Part.Velocity.magnitude DeflectVelocity.Parent = Part Debris:AddItem(DeflectVelocity, 10) -- reorient it so it is facing the direction it is going Part.CFrame = CFrame.new(Part.Position, (Part.Position + DeflectVelocity.velocity.unit)) if not Attacker or not Attacker.Parent or not Attacker.Character then return end local torso = Attacker.Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not torso then return end if not Part:FindFirstChild("Fire") then local Fire = Instance.new("Fire") Fire.Color = Color3.new((105 / 255), (222 / 255), (214/ 255)) Fire.Enabled = true Fire.Parent = Part end DeflectVelocity.velocity = (torso.CFrame.p - Part.CFrame.p).unit * Part.Velocity.magnitude * 2 Part.Touched:connect(function(OtherPart) if not OtherPart or not OtherPart.Parent or not Attacker or not Attacker.Parent or not Attacker.Character then return end local humanoid = Attacker.Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not humanoid then return end if OtherPart.Parent == Attacker.Character then humanoid:TakeDamage(50) if Part and Part.Parent then Part:Destroy() end end end) end
function AddFeatures(Sphere, Range) local HealTick = 0 while Sphere and Sphere.Parent do Spawn(function() local IgnoreObjects = {CurrentCharacter, Sphere} local NegativePartRadius = Vector3.new((Range.X / 2), (Range.Y / 2), (Range.Z / 2)) local PositivePartRadius = Vector3.new((Range.X / 2), (Range.Y / 2), (Range.Z / 2)) local Parts = game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartsInRegion3WithIgnoreList(Region3.new(Sphere.Position - NegativePartRadius, Sphere.Position + PositivePartRadius), IgnoreObjects, 100) for i, v in pairs(Parts) do if v and v.Parent then HandleReflection(Sphere, v) end end if (tick() - HealTick) >= 1 then HealTick = tick() local HealedSomebody = false for i, v in pairs(Players:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Player") and v.Character then local humanoid = v.Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local torso = v.Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if humanoid and torso and humanoid.Health > 0 and (torso.Position - Sphere.Position).magnitude <= MaxHealDistance then Humanoid.Health = math.min(Humanoid.MaxHealth, Humanoid.Health + 10) HealedSomebody = true end end end if HealedSomebody then Sounds.Pulse:Play() end end end) wait() end end
function TweenScale(SphereMesh, StartSize, EndSize, TweenDuration, Steps) local StepSize = (TweenDuration / Steps) for i = 0, Steps do local Ratio = (i / Steps) SphereMesh.Scale = ((1 - Ratio) * StartSize + (EndSize * Ratio)) wait(StepSize) end SphereMesh.Scale = EndSize end
function TweenCFrame(Sphere, StartCFrame, EndCFrame, TweenDuration, Steps) local StepSize = (TweenDuration / Steps) for i = 0, Steps do local Ratio = (i / Steps) Sphere.CFrame = CFrame.new((1 - Ratio) * StartCFrame.p + (EndCFrame.p * Ratio)) wait(StepSize) end Sphere.CFrame = EndCFrame end
function Activated() if not ReadyToActivate then return end
ReadyToActivate = false Tool.Enabled = false
CurrentCharacter = Character CurrentTorso = Torso
Handle.Transparency = 1
local Sphere = SpherePart:Clone() Sphere.Name = "ProtectionSphere" Sphere.Transparency = 1 local SphereMesh = Sphere:FindFirstChild("Mesh") Debris:AddItem(Sphere, Duration) Sphere.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") Spawn(function() TweenScale(SphereMesh, Vector3.new(0.1, 0.1, 0.1), Vector3.new(4, 4, 4), 0.5, 10) end) local TorsoCFrame = CFrame.new(CurrentTorso.Position) Spawn(function() TweenCFrame(Sphere, TorsoCFrame, (TorsoCFrame + Vector3.new(0, 8.5, 0)), 0.5, 10) end) Sounds.PoweringUp:Play() for i = 1, 15 do Sphere.Transparency = math.max(0, (Sphere.Transparency - 0.05)) wait(0.1) end Sphere.Transparency = 0.25 Spawn(function() AddFeatures(Sphere, Vector3.new(32.5, 25, 32.5)) end) wait((Duration - 1.5)) Handle.Transparency = 0.25 Sounds.ShutDown:Play() Tool.Enabled = true ReadyToActivate = true end
function PlayerIsAlive() return (Player.Parent and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Torso.Parent) end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not PlayerIsAlive() then return end end
function Unequipped() Handle.Transparency = 0 end
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
